entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Scott AAFC 12:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
